name: medama
description: Medama is a UI-first, self-hosted error tracking and monitoring tool for developers. It offers stack traces, session replay, and alerts to help diagnose issues in applications without relying on external services.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configure notifications for critical errors via email, Slack, or webhooks

features.title: Source Map Support
features.description: Automatically map minified code to original source for easier debugging

features.title: User Context
features.description: Track which users experienced errors with custom user identification

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Separate errors by environment like production, staging, or development

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Track application performance metrics alongside error data
